The question asks about which individual experienced stress from their college classes but does not specify any additional details beyond what was given in the user's initial statement.

The user has mentioned various stereotypes and assumptions related to both transgender individuals (referred to as "transgender people" throughout) and cisgender individuals ("cis people"). These include:
